notes.body: Hello Sakshi Gupta,    Greetings from PharmEasy!  This email is in reference to your order #654809934314033152-88982.  As per the update received on your concern, please note that a return has been raised for 'GRIP HAIR DH TUBE OF 150ML CONDITIONER' - 2 quantity on Aug 3rd Dec, 2025, also same has been picked up and refund of Rs.1,240.20/- against it is processed to your online source within 5-7 working days.  We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you by your order. Be rest assured, as we have jotted down the details of your experience. We have shared stern feedback with the team and we will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.  For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!  Regards, PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Sakshi Gupta,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is in reference to your order #654809934314033152-88982.

As per the update received on your concern, please note that a return has been raised for 'GRIP HAIR DH TUBE OF 150ML CONDITIONER' - 2 quantity on Aug 3rd Dec, 2025, also same has been picked up and refund of Rs.1,240.20/- against it is processed to your online source within 5-7 working days.

We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you by your order. Be rest assured, as we have jotted down the details of your experience. We have shared stern feedback with the team and we will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body:
Merged from ticket 22245948  
      Subject: Harassment  
      Description:  Dear sir  
 
 I attempted to purchase the injection “Prolia” through PharmEasy on 01.12.25 and made a payment of ₹14,000. After about an hour, I was informed that the order was cancelled due to the absence of the doctor’s signature on the prescription. 
   
 Since the medication was urgent, I obtained a freshly signed prescription from the doctor and placed a new order, again paying ₹14,000. However, after a few hours, this order too was cancelled, this time citing non-availability of stock. 
   
 I have not yet received any refund for the payments made, which is preventing me from purchasing the medicine from the open market. This experience amounts to harassment and has caused undue inconvenience. 
   
 Rajesh Tiwari  
 8200295417 
   
 Yahoo Mail: Search, organise, conquer 
 
 Disclaimer:

notes.body_html:
Merged from ticket 22245948

Subject: Harassment

Description:
Dear sir 
I attempted to purchase the injection “Prolia” through PharmEasy on 01.12.25 and made a payment of ₹14,000. After about an hour, I was informed that the order was cancelled due to the absence of the doctor’s signature on the prescription.

Since the medication was urgent, I obtained a freshly signed prescription from the doctor and placed a new order, again paying ₹14,000. However, after a few hours, this order too was cancelled, this time citing non-availability of stock.

I have not yet received any refund for the payments made, which is preventing me from purchasing the medicine from the open market. This experience amounts to harassment and has caused undue inconvenience.

Rajesh Tiwari 
8200295417

Yahoo Mail: Search, organise, conquer

Disclaimer:
This email contains proprietary, business-confidential, and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution or action in relation to the contents of this email is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful and request you to permanently delete this message and any attachments herein. You are requested to advise the sender, of your receipt of this email by return e-mail. The Company and its affiliates rule out any and every liability resulting from this or any other electronic transmission.

notes.body: Hello Rajesh,     Greetings from PharmEasy!    Thank you for your time on the call. Pursuant to our conversation, I have highlighted the issue to the concern team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,     PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Rajesh,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

Thank you for your time on the call. Pursuant to our conversation, I have highlighted the issue to the concern team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
PharmEasy

Hello Vaibhav Vichare,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #654381652553474048-75353, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 03rd December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Sir/ Madam,
  I am very sorry to say that service of  pune phameasy medicine delivery
center is more than worst.
  Before 10 days I have placed medicine order which they have not
delivered. After 4 days I was compelled to cancell the order.
  Again I have placed order on 30 th Nov vide order no 654097756145057792
for Rs. 1635.35 which has not yet been delivered, though system has showed
me that it will be delivered on next day within 10 p.m.
  Now my question is what is your delivery process? Why your system shows
delivery date on next date whereas it is not possible by your company?
Moreover Pharmeasy is sending various messages throughout the day which is
very ridiculous.
  Every person place order for medicine on emergency basis.  If it is not
possible by your company to deliver in time why they receive medicine
order? Todays market is very competitive. There are so many medicine
supplying companies whose service is  very promt.
  If I will not receive my order tomorrow within 11.30 a.m I will not only
cancell my order I will place it in Consumer Forum and media also.
  With thanks,
Aparna Saha Dalal,
Riverdale Residances,
Block E2,  Flat 1804,
Kharadi, Pune 411014

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Non receipt of order in time repeatedly
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Sir/ Madam, 
  I am very sorry to say that service of  pune phameasy medicine delivery center is more than worst.
  Before 10 days I have placed medicine order which they have not delivered. After 4 days I was compelled to cancell the order. 
  Again I have placed order on 30 th Nov vide order no 654097756145057792 for Rs. 1635.35 which has not yet been delivered, though system has showed me that it will be delivered on next day within 10 p.m.
  Now my question is what is your delivery process? Why your system shows delivery date on next date whereas it is not possible by your company? Moreover Pharmeasy is sending various messages throughout the day which is very ridiculous. 
  Every person place order for medicine on emergency basis.  If it is not possible by your company to deliver in time why they receive medicine order? Todays market is very competitive. There are so many medicine supplying companies whose service is  very promt.
  If I will not receive my order tomorrow within 11.30 a.m I will not only cancell my order I will place it in Consumer Forum and media also.  
  With thanks, 
Aparna Saha Dalal,
Riverdale Residances, 
Block E2,  Flat 1804,
Kharadi, Pune 411014

notes.body: Hello Ansh Kumar,    Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #654767895706337280-34260, as checked your order was cancelled on 03rd December 2025. Due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     We would like to inform you that cancellation refund of Rs.259.38/- initiated on 03rd December 2025. The refund  will refunded  payments source within 05-07 business days.     We would request you to place a new order and we will ensure the order is delivered to you on priority.     Be rest assured as I have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. Looking forward to delighting you soon.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy

I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.   Please be informed that the teleconsultation for the order has been successfully completed. The order in process, and the medicines are being arranged. The estimated delivery date is 03rd December 2025.     I have highlighted the issue to the Operations team regarding the teleconsultation. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.   I appreciate your patience in the meantime.   Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Customer Support Team,

Order ID : 654857163485216768
Placed on : Tuesday , 2nd December 2025


I am writing regarding the tele-consultation required for confirming my
current order. I have always placed my orders using my registered account
and have consistently received the doctor’s confirmation call on my
registered mobile number.

However, today the confirmation call is being made to the mobile number
provided in the delivery address instead. I order these medicines for my
elderly parents, who are senior citizens and speak only Malayalam. They are
unable to understand the language used by your support executives, which is
causing a communication issue.

I also tried calling the support number listed in the order section to
avoid cancellation, but I could not get through.

I kindly request you to please make the doctor’s confirmation call to my
registered mobile number, not the delivery-address number. It is very
important that this order is not cancelled, as my parents urgently need
these medicines.

I have been using your app for a long time and have never faced such an
issue before. Please resolve this at the earliest.

Thank you for your support.

Attaching the profile details and order details

Warm regards,
Maheswari Soman
9744267719

--

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear Customer Support Team,

Order ID : 654857163485216768
Placed on : Tuesday , 2nd December 2025


I am writing regarding the tele-consultation required for confirming my current order. I have always placed my orders using my registered account and have consistently received the doctor’s confirmation call on my registered mobile number.

However, today the confirmation call is being made to the mobile number provided in the delivery address instead. I order these medicines for my elderly parents, who are senior citizens and speak only Malayalam. They are unable to understand the language used by your support executives, which is causing a communication issue.

I also tried calling the support number listed in the order section to avoid cancellation, but I could not get through.

I kindly request you to please make the doctor’s confirmation call to my registered mobile number, not the delivery-address number. It is very important that this order is not cancelled, as my parents urgently need these medicines.

I have been using your app for a long time and have never faced such an issue before. Please resolve this at the earliest.

Thank you for your support.

Attaching the profile details and order details 

Warm regards,
Maheswari Soman
9744267719

notes.body: Hello Maheswari,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern with regard to the order ID #654857163485216768-76240. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order, and I will surely assist you with this.     As per the records, the order was assigned for a doctor consultation. Our partnered doctors tried twice to reach out to you for the consultation. However, they were unable to connect with you.     I am arranging a doctor's callback at your registered mobile number. You will be receiving a call within 2 hours. I would request that you answer the call so that the order can be processed further. I assure you the order will be processed with priority once the doctor consultation is completed.      You can also reach out to us on 080-46161170 for your doctor consultation.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Maheswari,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern with regard to the order ID #654857163485216768-76240. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order, and I will surely assist you with this.

As per the records, the order was assigned for a doctor consultation. Our partnered doctors tried twice to reach out to you for the consultation. However, they were unable to connect with you.

I am arranging a doctor's callback at your registered mobile number. You will be receiving a call within 2 hours. I would request that you answer the call so that the order can be processed further. I assure you the order will be processed with priority once the doctor consultation is completed. 

You can also reach out to us on 080-46161170 for your doctor consultation.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body:
Dear Customer Support Team,

I tried calling the consultation service multiple times from my *registered
mobile number*, but the automated message keeps saying that there is no
order or tele-consultation booked for this number. At the same time, my
mother is receiving repeated calls which she is unable to answer or
understand.
The 'Need Help' section was of no use.

I request you to please *redirect all confirmation/tele-consultation calls
to my registered mobile number*, *not the delivery-address number*. The
number mentioned in the delivery section is only for delivery agents, as my
elderly parents can communicate with them in their native language. They
are unable to communicate with consultation support executives.

This situation is getting extremely frustrating. I place orders on
PharmEasy expecting smooth service and hassle-free delivery of medicines to
my parents, but this repeated issue is causing more stress than ease.

My order is still showing as “*On Hold*”, and I urgently need the medicines
delivered to my parents.
Please help me confirm the order and ensure that all communication is
directed to the customer who actually placed the order — on the* registered
mobile number.*

Thank you for your prompt assistance.

Warm regards,
Maheswari Soman
9744267719
notes.body_html:
Dear Customer Support Team,

I tried calling the consultation service multiple times from my registered mobile number, but the automated message keeps saying that there is no order or tele-consultation booked for this number. At the same time, my mother is receiving repeated calls which she is unable to answer or understand.
The 'Need Help' section was of no use.

I request you to please redirect all confirmation/tele-consultation calls to my registered mobile number, not the delivery-address number. The number mentioned in the delivery section is only for delivery agents, as my elderly parents can communicate with them in their native language. They are unable to communicate with consultation support executives.

This situation is getting extremely frustrating. I place orders on PharmEasy expecting smooth service and hassle-free delivery of medicines to my parents, but this repeated issue is causing more stress than ease.

My order is still showing as “On Hold”, and I urgently need the medicines delivered to my parents.
Please help me confirm the order and ensure that all communication is directed to the customer who actually placed the order — on the registered mobile number.

Thank you for your prompt assistance.

Warm regards,
Maheswari Soman
9744267719

notes.body: Hello Maheswari,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   ​With regards to your order #654857163485216768-17647, I see your order is dispatched and it is being delivered by a courier partner. The estimated delivery date is 07th December 2025.  ​   ​Please be informed that, as per our records, the doctor teleconsultation was successfully completed on 03rd December 2025 at 12:12 PM.      ​I would like to inform you that the estimated date of delivery depends on the availability of the medicines and the delivery pin code. Also, be informed that PharmEasy will always try to ensure that your order is delivered at the earliest as we completely understand the urgency of the medicine.  Please note that the estimated date of delivery for courier orders will vary based on the delivery location. Your order will be delivered within the estimated delivery date committed at the time of order placement. Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.  ​   ​You may also track your order from here ​https://www.shiprocket.in/shipment-tracking/ with the AWB number 35899336054475.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Maheswari,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
​With regards to your order #654857163485216768-17647, I see your order is dispatched and it is being delivered by a courier partner. The estimated delivery date is 07th December 2025.
​
​Please be informed that, as per our records, the doctor teleconsultation was successfully completed on 03rd December 2025 at 12:12 PM.

​I would like to inform you that the estimated date of delivery depends on the availability of the medicines and the delivery pin code. Also, be informed that PharmEasy will always try to ensure that your order is delivered at the earliest as we completely understand the urgency of the medicine.

Please note that the estimated date of delivery for courier orders will vary based on the delivery location. Your order will be delivered within the estimated delivery date committed at the time of order placement. Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.
​
​You may also track your order from here ​https://www.shiprocket.in/shipment-tracking/ with the AWB number 35899336054475.
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Debayan,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #652734303485796352-30214, as checked the return request is already raised for medicine from your order. As per the records, the medicines are picked up on 04 December 2025.     As the medicine has been  returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days.      We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. notes.body_html:
Hello Debayan,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #652734303485796352-30214, as checked the return request is already raised for medicine from your order. As per the records, the medicines are picked up on 04 December 2025.

As the medicine has been  returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days. 

We appreciate your patience in the meantime.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Nihar,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern in regard to the cash on delivery related.     I am sorry I would like to inform you that currently, we are not providing cash on delivery to your area Pincode 700021.     I understand that you are not getting the option to select Cash on Delivery as your preferred choice of payment. The inapplicability of the COD option depends on multiple reasons (types of medicines ordered, delivery location, supplier's location, etc.). For now, the option of Cash on delivery is unavailable on this number. For future orders, if the option is available, it will be visible in the payment modes in the App and Website. helpdesk_ticket.description:
Team,

You have advertised Rs.114.75 per unit as the price (working out to a
discount of Rs.20.25) for the captioned product on your website on the
product page which is reflected on the Google search results too (please
check the 1st 2 screenshots below), whereas on the billing page this
discount is not reflected (please see the screenshot of the bill summary
too, for that, by way of the 3rd screenshot below) - rather only a total
discount of Rs.48, i.e. Rs.8 per unit is reflected (of which the MRP
discount per unit works out to only Rs.1.35). What is the reason for this
discrepancy? *Please call back on 8104566254 at the earliest, to resolve/
clarify this query.*

[image: image.png]
[image: image.png][image: image.png]
regards,
Rajani

notes.body: Hello Anupam,     Greetings from PharmEasy!          I understand you wish to return the product from your order #654812508446478336-24233. I am sorry to know that you have received medicines in a damaged condition.     Please note that if we raise a return request for the product, then the refund amount will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet. If you do not wish to get the refund in your PharmEasy wallet, then I request you to please set your refund preference.      Click on the link to set the refund preference: https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds     Once you set your refund preference, either PharmEasy Wallet or the original payment source, you may contact us again, and we will take the necessary action accordingly.     Kindly send all side images of the product in JPEG or PNG format with the barcode (PharmEasy QR code) and the batch number (MRP and expiry details) so that we can take further action.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Habiba

Once you set your refund preference, either PharmEasy Wallet or the original payment source, you may contact us again, and we will take the necessary action accordingly.

Habiba

notes.body: ​​​​Hello,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #654812508446478336-24233, I am sorry to know that you have received item in a damaged condition. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.     I have raised a return request for LOFTAIR 110/50MCG BOX OF 30 CAPSULES AND 1 INHALER of 1 quantity.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 24 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 24-48 hours. Also, once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source in 5-7 business days.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #654812508446478336-24233, I am sorry to know that you have received item in a damaged condition. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

I have raised a return request for LOFTAIR 110/50MCG BOX OF 30 CAPSULES AND 1 INHALER of 1 quantity.

Please note that the medicine will be collected within 24 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 24-48 hours. Also, once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source in 5-7 business days.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Thank you for the update.

To clarify, the medicine (capsules) was delivered and has already been
used, as it was an urgent prescription. Only the inhaler was missing from
the package.

I request that you cancel the return request, as I do not wish to return
the medicine. Instead, please process a partial refund for the missing
inhaler only. I have already purchased an inhaler separately from a local
store.

As this issue has been escalated multiple times, I would appreciate a quick
resolution.

Anupam Prasad

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Support Team,

I am writing this email to officially raise a complaint regarding the
unacceptable delay and miscommunication related to my recent order (Order
ID: *652322459713740800*).

My order has been *stuck at the same Delhivery facility for the past 4 days*,
and the courier tracking clearly shows an expected delivery date of *6th
December*, which is completely different from your app’s promise of *“Tomorrow
before 10:00 PM”*. This inconsistency shows a serious lapse in coordination
and transparency.

Over the last four days, I contacted your customer care multiple times.
Unfortunately:

   -

   Your agents repeatedly *misled me* by assuring that my order *would
   definitely be delivered today before 10 PM*.
   -

   They also claimed that an *internal complaint was raised* and that the
   delivery partner had confirmed delivery.
   -

   However, Delhivery’s tracking shows *no such update* and the product has
   not moved for days.
   -

   One of my previous orders 649083095828049920 was cancelled without
   informing me, which shows extremely poor service handling.

This situation is extremely disappointing and has caused unnecessary stress
and inconvenience. The inaccurate information provided by your support team
amounts to *misleading communication* and violates customer rights under
the *Consumer Protection Act, 2019*.

As per law, I have the right to accurate delivery timelines, proper
communication, and compensation in case of service failure.
*If my order is not delivered by the promised date and time as shown in
your app, I will be forced to:*

   -

   File an official complaint with the *Consumer Court / Consumer Forum*,
   -

   Seek *compensation* for mental distress and misleading commitments,
   -

   Report the issue to consumer protection authorities for *unfair trade
   practice and service negligence*.

I request an *immediate resolution*, accurate delivery update, and written
confirmation of the revised timeline.

Kindly treat this as a high-priority escalation.
[image: image.png]
[image: image.png]


-- 


*Best Regards*
*S Sundarpaul*
? +91 9786896893
? LinkedIn Profile <https://www.linkedin.com/in/ssundarpaul/>

*          Imagination Leads You to Knowledge -S.Sundarpaul*

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Urgent Complaint – Delivery Delay, Miscommunication & Customer Support Negligence (Order ID: 652322459713740800)
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear PharmEasy Support Team,
I am writing this email to officially raise a complaint regarding the unacceptable delay and miscommunication related to my recent order (Order ID: 652322459713740800).
My order has been stuck at the same Delhivery facility for the past 4 days, and the courier tracking clearly shows an expected delivery date of 6th December, which is completely different from your app’s promise of “Tomorrow before 10:00 PM”. This inconsistency shows a serious lapse in coordination and transparency.
Over the last four days, I contacted your customer care multiple times. Unfortunately:
  • Your agents repeatedly misled me by assuring that my order would definitely be delivered today before 10 PM.
  • They also claimed that an internal complaint was raised and that the delivery partner had confirmed delivery.
  • However, Delhivery’s tracking shows no such update and the product has not moved for days.
  • One of my previous orders 649083095828049920 was cancelled without informing me, which shows extremely poor service handling.
This situation is extremely disappointing and has caused unnecessary stress and inconvenience. The inaccurate information provided by your support team amounts to misleading communication and violates customer rights under the Consumer Protection Act, 2019.
As per law, I have the right to accurate delivery timelines, proper communication, and compensation in case of service failure.

If my order is not delivered by the promised date and time as shown in your app, I will be forced to:

  • File an official complaint with the Consumer Court / Consumer Forum,
  • Seek compensation for mental distress and misleading commitments,
  • Report the issue to consumer protection authorities for unfair trade practice and service negligence.
I request an immediate resolution, accurate delivery update, and written confirmation of the revised timeline.
Kindly treat this as a high-priority escalation.



--
Best Regards

S Sundarpaul
📞 +91 9786896893
🔗 LinkedIn Profile

          Imagination Leads You to Knowledge -S.Sundarpaul
